modName: Clan Armstrong Tartan Companions Wolf Cuirass
summary: Adds a non-replacing retexture of the default Wolf Cuirass based off of Clan Armstrong's colors. You can purchase one from Johnny Armstrong near the Whiterun smelter.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a non-replacing retexture of the default Wolf Cuirass based off of Clan Armstrong's colors. You can purchase one from Johnny Armstrong near the Whiterun smelter.

What is added:
-An armor based off of the traditional Tartan applied to the Wolf Cuirass from the Companions.
-Johnny Armstrong to sell them.

Credits:
-Laird Yuri - Retexture and Johnny Armstrong name
-Adobe Photoshop - Program used for retexture


Follow me on Facebook for updates: [url=https://www.facebook.com/ArronDominionProductions/]Arron Dominion Productions[/url]
author: Arron Dominion and Laird Yuri
